short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hanty extension to help on your job hunting journey!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your job hunt with Hanty, the ultimate companion for your job-seeking journey! 

This Chrome extension is designed to simplify and enhance your job search experience. Track applications effortlessly, organize job listings efficiently, and stay on top of your progress with intuitive features tailored to your needs. Say goodbye to scattered notes, spreadsheets and missed opportunities.

Let Hanty transform your job hunting process into a seamless, organized adventure.
